What to Know About the SAIBCS Application Form Portal

The SAIBCS Application portal is designed to accept applications of candidates seeking admission into the University. In the portal, applicants can Purchase application forms, Track and monitor application status, pay fees, Print Acknowledgement Slips, check the admission list, etc.

South African Institute of Business and Chartered Studies

The South African Institute of Business and Chartered Studies (SAIBCS) is a private education and training institution based in Johannesburg, South Africa. It offers a range of business and management courses and qualifications, including diplomas, degrees, and postgraduate programs.

SAIBCS has been in operation since 2007 and has established itself as a reputable provider of business education in South Africa. It is accredited by various regulatory bodies, including the Council on Higher Education (CHE) and the South African Qualifications Authority (SAQA).

The institute aims to provide practical and relevant business education that prepares students for careers in various industries. It offers courses in fields such as accounting, human resources, marketing, project management, and entrepreneurship.

In addition to its academic programs, SAIBCS also provides executive education and training, consulting services, and research in various areas of business and management. It has partnerships with various local and international institutions and organizations to enhance the quality of its programs and services.

Who is Eligible to Apply for Admission

To be eligible for admission to the SAIBCS application portal, candidates must;

  • Have a Secondary School Leaving Certificate
  • Meet National Senior Certificate (NSC) requirement for admission into Higher Certificate
  • Grade 12 certificate applicant is of added advantage
  • Must write the NBTs for admission to SAIBCS on/before 15 October 2024.
  • FPS of 480 or above.
  • NBT scores of Upper
  • Intermediate for AL & QL
  • Mathematics 60%
  • English HL 50%
  • English FAL 60%

SAIBCS Application Requirements

The South African Institute of Business and Chartered Studies (SAIBCS) has specific application requirements that students must meet in order to be considered for admission. Here are some general application requirements for SAIBCS:

Completed application form: All applicants must complete the SAIBCS application form, which can be downloaded from the institute’s website or obtained from the admissions office.

Certified copies of academic transcripts: Applicants must submit certified copies of their academic transcripts, including high school or secondary school certificates, as well as any post-secondary education qualifications.

English language proficiency: SAIBCS requires that all applicants demonstrate proficiency in English if it is not their first language. This can be done by providing results from an English language proficiency test such as the TOEFL or IELTS.

Proof of identity: Applicants must provide a certified copy of their identity document or passport.

Application fee: A non-refundable application fee may be required to be paid when submitting the application.

Additional requirements: Depending on the program, additional requirements may be needed, such as a personal statement, CV, or work experience.

How to Apply for the SAIBCS Application Form 2024

The South African Institute of Business and Chartered Studies (SAIBCS) application can be accessed through their website or by contacting the admissions office directly. Here are the steps to access the SAIBCS application:
  • Visit the SAIBCS website: Go to the SAIBCS website at https://www.saibcs.co.za/.
  • Navigate to the Admissions page: Click on the “Admissions” link, which is usually located in the main menu or on the homepage.
  • Select the program of interest: Select the program of interest from the list of available programs. Each program should have its own application form.
  • Download the application form: Click on the “Download Application Form” button to download the application form for the chosen program. The application form is usually in PDF format.
  • Fill out the application form: Complete the application form, providing all required information and supporting documents.
  • Submit the application: Submit the completed application form along with any required documents and the application fee, if applicable, to the SAIBCS admissions office.

SAIBCS Application Required Documents

To apply to SAIBCS you need to submit the following documentation:

  • A completed application form
  • A copy of your results for the latest school year
  • A copy of your ID
  • If you have attended another higher education institution, we need a copy of your academic transcript

FAQ about SAIBCS Online Application

Here are some frequently asked questions (FAQs) about the South African Institute of Business and Chartered Studies (SAIBCS) online application:

Q: Is it possible to apply to SAIBCS online? A: Yes, SAIBCS offers an online application system through its website.

Q: How do I access the SAIBCS online application? A: To access the online application, visit the SAIBCS website and follow the application instructions for the program of interest.

Q: Do I need to create an account to apply online? A: Yes, applicants will need to create an account with a valid email address and password to access the SAIBCS online application.

Q: What information do I need to provide in the online application? A: Applicants will need to provide personal information, academic history, English language proficiency results (if applicable), and any additional required documents.

Q: Can I save my progress and come back to the online application later? A: Yes, the SAIBCS online application allows applicants to save their progress and continue at a later time.

Q: Can I submit my supporting documents online? A: Yes, applicants can upload their supporting documents directly to the online application system. However, original copies may still need to be submitted to the SAIBCS admissions office.

Q: Is there an application fee for the online application? A: Yes, applicants may be required to pay a non-refundable application fee when submitting their application online.

Q: How do I know if my online application has been received? A: Applicants will receive a confirmation email once their application has been received and processed by the SAIBCS admissions office.

Q: What should I do if I have technical issues with the online application? A: If you encounter technical issues with the online application, you can contact the SAIBCS admissions office for assistance.
